item.title: Why Colorado’s Counseling Censorship Should Lose at the Supreme Court
item.description: At least three aspects of the case should lead to free speech prevailing.

item.title: National Guard Standoff Is a Recipe for More Political Conflict
item.description: The incentive structure here is all wrong.

item.title: Time to Spring Trump’s Tariff Trap
item.description: As a condition of ending the shutdown, Democrats should curb the president’s tariff powers.

item.title: The War Against Immigration Enforcement
item.description: Chicago residents have failed to do the one thing necessary to avoid National Guard deployment — let federal officers do their jobs.

item.title: Colorado Gender Ideology Wages War on Religious Freedom
item.description: The Supreme Court has the opportunity to reaffirm that religious freedom is not conditional on ideological conformity.
